T02D1260:285b-1: mri tyu bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1260:285b-3: gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1260:285b-4: kyee'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//
T02D1260:285b-5: gang zag gang phyir shi 'phos te /
T02D1260:285b-6: kyee rdo rje'i lugs kyis bdun tshig byed par 'dod na /
T02D1260:285b-7: gos la sogs pa'i rtags gcig la rten bya ba 'am /
T02D1260:285b-8: yang na ming shog bu la bri'o //
T02D1260:285b-9: mandala dang mchod pa dang gtor ma yang gzhung ltar bsham mo //
T02D1260:285b-10: de nas rang lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la /
T02D1260:285b-11: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te /
T02D1260:285b-12: mchod pa'i khyad par gyis mchod la /
T02D1260:285b-14: mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma bsngos la 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab po //
T02D1260:285b-15: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis /
T02D1260:285b-16: tshe 'phos pa'i sems yi ge aa thung gi gzugs su 'od zer gyi lcags kyus bkug nas /
T02D1260:285b-17: rten gang yin pa la bstim mo //
T02D1260:285b-18: rnam smin gyi lus gang yin pa der bsams la /
T02D1260:285b-19: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te /
T02D1260:285b-20: bsgrub bya'i snying gar thim pas las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs te /
T02D1260:285b-21: lus shel lta bur bsam mo //
T02D1260:285b-22: de nas mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i ye shes
T02D1260:285b-23: kyi dkyil 'khor dang rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi
T02D1260:285b-24: phyag na bsnams pa'i bum pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun
T02D1260:286a-1: bag chags thams cad byang bar bsam mo //
T02D1260:286a-2: de nas bzlas pa byas te /
T02D1260:286a-3: bdag gi snying ga'i yi ge las bzlas pa'i yi
T02D1260:286a-4: ge'i phreng ba sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du bskor bar
T02D1260:286a-5: bsams la / de'i phreng sngags gang yin pa bzlas
T02D1260:286a-6: pas sngags kyi phreng ba las 'od zer 'phros pas
T02D1260:286a-7: bsams la / / bsgrub bya'i snying gar thim pas /
T02D1260:286a-8: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad byang bar bsam zhing bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1260:286a-9: de nas smon lam gdab cing dge ba'i rtsa bar bsgyur ro //
T02D1260:286a-10: de nas bsgrub bya'i shes pa aa thung du ste /
T02D1260:286a-11: yam gi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bteg nas nam
T02D1260:286a-12: mkhar bzhugs pa'i gtso bo'i thugs kar thim par bsams
T02D1260:286a-14: gal te rten med par gyur na /
T02D1260:286a-15: gang yin pa'i rnam smin gyi lus de nyid mngon
T02D1260:286a-16: sum dang 'dra bar bsams la mngon rtogs sngar bzhin
T02D1260:286a-17: bya'o // de ltar zhag bdun pa thams cad la bya'o //
T02D1260:286a-18: gshin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1260:286a-20: // / pandi ta chen po rgyal ba'i snyan las legs par mnyan te /
T02D1260:286a-21: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan
T02D1260:286a-22: dpal bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag
